job.title: Privacy Software Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtimagine what you could do here at apple new ideas have a way of becoming great products services and customer experiences very quickly bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish apple delivers great features and great privacy to our users the privacy engineering team works with teams all across the company to make sure that products and services protect user privacy by designing architectures that reduce the exposure of user data at all levels of the technology stack we are looking for an outstanding candidate to become a member of the apple user privacy teamltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtpassion for customer privacyltbrgtltbrgtability to learn and research new technologies rapidly assess privacy exposures and suggest mitigationsltbrgtltbrgtability to analyze systems architectures for privacy impactltbrgtltbrgtprogramming experienceltbrgtltbrgtability to solve complex problems independentlyltbrgtltbrgtstrong collaboration communication interpersonal and organizational skillsltbrgtltbrgtability to track and manage numerous parallel activitiesltbrgtltbrgtability to work in a fastpaced dynamic environmentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtprivacy engineers review features to identify privacy exposures and mitigate them audit new products to identify and remediate bugs in development review customer data collected by engineering teams to drive decisions and work with teams to build new features to protect user privacy from wifi mac address randomization to differential privacy ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtsuccessful candidates will need to have programming experience superb communication skills and a passion for protecting privacy creative problem solving analytical and deductive reasoning skills are critical for this position you will be working on multiple unrelated systems each week so the ability to learn quickly and an excitement for new things is a mustltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbscs or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgt
